document_data.name: Amulet of the Watch
document_data.mainbody: An '''''amulet of the watch''''' was a [[Item enchantment|magical]] [[amulet]] that was worn by the captains of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] of [[Waterdeep]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The amulet was crafted in the shape of a tiny [[shield]] and was emblazoned with the Waterdhavian city crest.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, the wearer of the amulet could cast ''[[whispering wind]]'' as per the spell. This ability was often used to summon additional members of the Watch or request help from the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]].
